name: Nachos
description: A popular Mexican dish consisting of heated tortilla chips covered with melted cheese, often served as a snack or appetizer with salsa, guacamole, or sour cream.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, and flavored with cocoa.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail made of five ingredients: white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.
